full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
### Solicitation Number: WS4496553378

**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for General Construction Services**

The Canadian government is inviting qualified contractors to submit responses to this Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for general construction services.

**Solicitation Overview**

The solicitation is open to all qualified contractors. The government is seeking contractors to provide general construction services for low-dollar construction, alterations, and urgent repair work at various Correctional Services Canada institutions in the Fraser Valley, British Columbia.

**Service Requirements**

* Construction services
* Alterations and additions
* Urgent repair work
* Painting and decorating services
* Carpentry services
* Roofing services
* Concrete services
* Acoustical and insulation services
* Kitchen cabinet installation services
* Bathroom and plumbing services

**Contracting Entity**
The contracting entity for this solicitation is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPWGS), working on behalf of the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC).

**Key Dates**

* Tender closure: April 10, 2024 (2:00 PM Eastern Time)
* Standing offer valid until May 14, 2026

**Bidder Eligibility**
Bidders must:
* Hold a valid Canadian Business Number (BN) and tax account number
* Not be blacklisted
* Not have any outstanding debt to the government
* Not have any conflicts of interest

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**
The tender will be evaluated based on a Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Additional Information**

* The solicitation document and any amendments can be accessed through the AribaPRO system at the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19150686?extsite=MTkxNTA2ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19150686?extsite=MTkxNTA2ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Questions regarding the solicitation must be submitted in writing to: [tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:tian.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

This solicitation is open to all qualified contractors and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) requirements.
